definitions.definition: to throw or drop something carelessly:
examples: Don't just sling your bag on the floor!

definitions.definition: to throw or give something to someone:
examples: [ + two objects ] Sling me a pen, will you?

definitions.definition: a device that uses a strap, piece of cloth, or ropes for supporting, lifting, or carrying objects:
examples: The cylinder was lifted from the seabed in a sling.

definitions.definition: a device for supporting a broken or damaged arm in which the arm is held in front of the body in a piece of cloth that is tied around the neck:
examples: I had my arm in a sling for six weeks.

definitions.definition: a device like a bag for carrying a baby, tied to the front or the back of an adult's body
a simple weapon used mainly in the past in which a strap held at the ends was used for throwing stones
